designer.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone whose job is to make plans or patterns for clothes, furniture, equipment etc
designer.translation[0].note_box[0].sect: the well-known fashion designer, Giorgio Armani
Christian Lacroix was one of Paris's most flamboyant dress designers.
She always wore clothes by top designers.
The apartment's previous owners had hired an expensive interior designer.
He's been working as a graphic designer for two years.
Software designers are working on a new operating system.
The software allows Web designers to embed small programs into their webpages.
A landscape designer was commissioned to design the garden.
The tables and chairs were made by the furniture designer Robert White.
He spent eight years as a costume designer for TV commercials.
designer.translation[1].definitions[0].d: made by a well-known and fashionable designer
designer.translation[1].definitions[0].n: designer label (=an expensive brand from a well-known designer)
designer.translation[2].definitions[0].d: someone whose job is to design products, equipment, furniture, clothes etc
designer.translation[2].definitions[0].e: This former Lockheed aircraft designer helped develop more than 40 airplanes and spacecraft.
designer.translation[3].definitions[0].d: designer clothes are fashionable and expensive and have been designed by a well-known fashion designer
